shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Partly Cloudy
name: Tonight
detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 7pm, then rain likely and patchy fog between 7pm and 9pm, then a slight chance of snow between 9pm and 10pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 25. West wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 39 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
